Title: Malliswari
Writer: Vijay K. Bhaskar (screenplay), Trivikram Srinivas (dialogue), Trivikram Srinivas (story)
Actors: Venkatesh Daggubati, Katrina Kaif, Srinivasa Rao Kota, Ganesh Babu
Plot: Malliswari is the heiress of Raja of Mirjapur. Her deceased father wrote in his will that she would inherit the property worth 750 crores after she is no longer legally a minor - at the age...
